cleaned_text: What are alternative medicine in Dubai, UAE [Alternative medicine](https://wellth.ae/specializations/) is a broad term that encompasses a wide range of practices and treatments that are not considered part of mainstream Western medicine. Alternative medicine is also referred to as complementary or integrative medicine when it is used in conjunction with conventional medical treatments. Alternative medicine includes practices such as acupuncture, herbal medicine, homeopathy, chiropractic care, energy healing, and massage therapy. Many people turn to alternative medicine because they feel that conventional medicine has not provided them with the relief they need, or they prefer a more natural approach to healthcare. While alternative medicine may not have the same scientific evidence to support its effectiveness as conventional medicine, many people have found it to be helpful in treating a variety of health conditions. Alternative medicine treatments are often focused on treating the root cause of an illness, rather than just treating its symptoms. Alternative medicine practitioners often take a holistic approach to healthcare, emphasizing the importance of treating the whole person rather than just the illness or condition. They may take into account factors such as a person's diet, lifestyle, and emotional well-being when developing a treatment plan. It is important to note that alternative medicine should not be used as a substitute for conventional medical care, especially in cases of serious or life-threatening conditions. It is always best to consult with a healthcare provider before starting any alternative medicine treatments. In conclusion, alternative medicine is a broad term that encompasses a wide range of practices and treatments that are not part of mainstream Western medicine.
